LanguageData.FRMT_Butter.label: Butter
LanguageData.FRMT_Butter.description: Butter is a dairy product with high butterfat content which is solid when chilled and at room temperature. It is generally used as a spread on plain or toasted bread products and a condiment on cooked vegetables, as well as in cooking, such as baking, sauce making, and pan frying.
LanguageData.FRMT_PrecursorButter.label: Butter Precursor
LanguageData.FRMT_PrecursorButter.description: A mix of milk and vegetable oil to be used in a fermentation vessel to make butter.
